actions: *Melee Weapon Attack:* +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit:* 1 (1d4 - 1) piercing damage.
name: Jackal
traits: The jackal has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.
The jackal has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the jackal's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
